desc: COOL Crafts works underneath the 501(c)3 nonprofit, Carnivores, Livelihoods and Landscapes (CaLL) that supports cheetahs and other wildlife conservation efforts by providing Kenyan artists with opportunities to sell their woodwork, jewelry, bead work, and other handmade items through international markets.

layout.text: Help us promote craft artists who support wildlife conservation in Kenya during these tough times.
